He, Jian, Rudan Lyu, Yike Luo, Jiamin Xiao, Lei Xie, Jun Wen, Wenhe Li, Linying Pei, and Jin Cheng. ["A phylotranscriptome study using silica gel-dried leaf tissues produces an updated robust phylogeny of Ranunculaceae." Molecular Phylogenetics and Evolution 174 (2022): 107545.](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ympev.2022.107545)

Ruiz-Vargas, Natalia, Karolis Ramanauskas, Alexa S. Tyszka, Roberta J. Mason-Gamer, and Joseph F. Walker. ["Transcriptome data from silica-preserved leaf tissue reveals gene flow patterns in a Caribbean bromeliad." bioRxiv (2023): 2023-06.] (https://doi.org/10.1101/2023.06.16.545126)

Yang, Ya, Michael J. Moore, Samuel F. Brockington, Alfonso Timoneda, Tao Feng, Hannah E. Marx, Joseph F. Walker, and Stephen A. Smith.
